techmeme.title: The US GSA says AWS has agreed to provide federal agencies with up to $1B in discounts for cloud adoption, modernization, and training through 2028 (Annie Palmer/CNBC)
SMIC reports Q2 revenue up 16.2% YoY to $2.2B, in line with expectations, and profit down 19.5% YoY to $132.5M, below $183.35M est. (Reuters)
Ripple plans to acquire stablecoin payments platform Rail for $200M, set to close in Q4 2025; Rail says it handles 10% of all global stablecoin payment activity (Hannah Lang/Reuters)
President Trump calls on Intel CEO Lip-Bu Tan to "resign, immediately" and says he "is highly CONFLICTED", after Senator Cotton asked about Tan's ties to China (Peter Elstrom/Bloomberg)

SignalFire: as the AI talent race explodes, Anthropic is hiring engineers 2.68x faster than losing them, above OpenAI's 2.18x, Meta's 2.07x, and Google's 1.17x (Isabelle Bousquette/Wall Street Journal)
